TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Don't just take our word for it - hear from the people who love our app!
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized my cooking experience! The step-by-step instructions and high-quality videos make even complex recipes a breeze.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a professional chef, I'm constantly impressed by the depth of knowledge and attention to detail in this app. It's an indispensable tool in my kitchen.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has ignited my passion for cooking again. The diverse range of recipes from around the world has opened my eyes to new flavors and techniques.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our meal planning app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What kind of recipes does the app include?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app has thousands of recipes covering all types of cuisines, dietary needs, and occasions. From quick weeknight dinners to fancy holiday feasts, we've got you covered.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How does the meal planning feature work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Just tell us your dietary preferences, how many people you're cooking for, and what ingredients you have on hand. Our smart technology will generate a custom meal plan with recipes tailored to your needs.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I save my favorite recipes?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely! Create an account to save unlimited recipes to your personal cookbook. You can also rate recipes and leave notes for future reference.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Is there a grocery list feature?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, based on your meal plan for the week, we generate an organized grocery list to make shopping a breeze. The list is sorted by aisle to save you time.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Simply download our app and follow the prompts to set up your profile and preferences. Our user-friendly interface makes meal planning fun and easy!
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Our app guides you step-by-step to cook mouthwatering meals from around the world.

FOOTER_COMPONENT_2_BODY_TEXT_2: From classic comfort foods to international delicacies, our app has something for every palate.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_2_BODY_TEXT_3: Explore new flavors and impress your friends and family with our delectable dishes.

FEATURE_1_BODY: Browse thousands of recipes from around the world, with filters to find exactly what you're craving. New recipes added daily.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Detailed instructions with photos and videos make even complex dishes easy to follow along and recreate at home.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Automatically generate a grocery shopping list based on the recipes you've selected, simplifying your meal prep.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Tailor your recipe feed to your specific dietary needs - vegan, gluten-free, keto, and more filters available.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Learn professional cooking techniques, ingredient substitutions, and kitchen hacks from our library of culinary wisdom.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Show off your delicious creations! Share photos of your meals and leave reviews on recipes you've tried.
CTA_BODY: Discover a world of delicious possibilities with our innovative cooking app. From mouthwatering recipes to seamless meal planning, we empower you to craft unforgettable culinary experiences effortlessly.

PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Cooking App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What features does the app offer?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our cooking app provides a vast collection of recipes, step-by-step instructions with photos/videos, shopping list creators, meal planners, and dietary preference filters to cater to your specific needs.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How can I find recipes I like?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: You can search by ingredient, cuisine type, dietary restriction, or use filters like vegetarian, gluten-free, etc. The app also learns your preferences over time and suggests personalized recommendations.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I save and organize my favorite recipes?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! Create your own digital cookbook by saving recipes you love. You can create custom categories and collections to stay organized.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is the app free to download and use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: The basic app download is free, but we offer a premium subscription with additional features like ad-free experience, exclusive premium recipes, and advanced meal planning tools.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Easily find and combine ingredients to create delicious meals. Our app puts a world of flavors right at your fingertips.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Follow simple instructions to cook like a pro. Our detailed recipes walk you through every step, ensuring perfect results every time.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Discover new dishes tailored to your tastes. Our app learns your preferences and suggests recipes you'll love.
